textAfterTable: Source: Financial Times Leave a comment Filed under Training Tagged as Best B-school Ranking, Best College, Best MBA Colleges, MBA, MBA colleges in Asia, MBA Ranking March 14, 2012 · 10:42 am Scholarships for studying abroad Quality education in this day and age comes at a premium. Many of the Indian students often are sceptical about pursuing further education from a good college both in India and abroad due to lack of funding. However there are many benevolent institutes which offer scholarships, interest free loans to deserving students. In addition these days most of the colleges also offer scholarship in a bid to attract quality students. However, there are certain things that students need to keep in mind before applying for these scholarships. The most important among them are to apply within the time-frame when these institutes are seeking application.
